name: Linear Regression
additionalInfo: Linear regression is a linear approach to modeling the relationship between a dependent variable and one or more independent variables. It assumes a linear relationship between the independent and dependent variables.

name: Decision Tree
additionalInfo: Decision trees are a popular method for classification and regression tasks. They recursively split the dataset into subsets based on the most significant attribute until the data in each subset is homogenous or a stopping criterion is met.

name: Random Forest
additionalInfo: Random forests are an ensemble learning method that constructs a multitude of decision trees during training and outputs the mode of the classes (classification) or mean prediction (regression) of the individual trees.
